basics.name: Alistair Grenyer
basics.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
basics.tagline: Building elegant solutions to complex problems
basics.summary: Experienced software engineer with a passion for creating scalable web applications and API solutions. Specializing in React, TypeScript, and modern backend technologies. Committed to writing clean, maintainable code and delivering exceptional user experiences.
basics.personalNote: When I'm not coding, you'll find me hiking in the Lake District or experimenting with new cooking recipes.

highlights: Led development of microservices architecture serving 2M+ users
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 40%
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews
Built RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express
Developed responsive frontend applications using React and TypeScript
Optimized database queries resulting in 30% faster load times
Developed and maintained company website and client portals
Collaborated with UX designers to implement responsive designs
Integrated third-party APIs for payment processing and analytics
Dissertation on ML applications in web development
